title: Story of Umar Khattab being influenced by an Ayah of Al Haqqa to accept Islam: true? Assim al hakeem
transcript: noor says there is uh an ayah in surat al-haqqa which influenced may allah be pleased with him to accept islam and he heard this from beyond or behind the curtain near the kaaba when the prophet was reciting this i don't know anything authentic about such a story to my the to the best of my knowledge so i don't believe that this is true at all muhammad
